verses.name: Acts 22:18
verses.text: And saw him saying unto me, Make haste, and get thee quickly out of Jerusalem: for they will not receive thy testimony concerning me.

verses.name: Acts 22:19
verses.text: And I said, Lord, they know that I imprisoned and beat in every synagogue them that believed on thee:

verses.name: Acts 22:20
verses.text: And when the blood of thy martyr Stephen was shed, I also was standing by, and consenting unto his death, and kept the raiment of them that slew him.

verses.name: Acts 22:21
verses.text: And he said unto me, Depart: for I will send thee far hence unto the Gentiles.
